column3: [' (StepDescription: Pour-Pour a small amount of water into the filter to wet the grounds)']
[' (StepDescription: Wait-Wait about 30 seconds for the coffee to bloom. (You will see small bubbles or foam on the coffee grounds during this step.))']
[' (StepDescription: pour-Slowly pour the rest of the water over the grounds in a circular motion. Do not overfill beyond the top of the paper filter)']
[' (StepDescription: drain-Let the coffee drain completely into the mug before removing the dripper)']
[' (StepDescription: Discard-Discard the paper filter and coffee grounds)']
